messages.title: Joe Richards leads the fight for Southampton Test
messages.content: Joe Richards is the strong choice to be Southampton Test’s next MP, and will fight for our schools, our NHS and our environment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Oppose wasteful spending and support remaining in the EU. Emphasizes the financial benefits of remaining.
Address air pollution in Southampton by investing in public transport and promoting ultra-low emission zones.
Provide support for the NHS, reverse Conservative cuts, and ensure healthcare workers have the resources they need.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit, oppose Conservative government's wasteful spending, support remaining in the EU, £50 billion remain bonus
issues.economy: £100 million wasted on Brexit campaign, £2 billion wasted on no-deal preparations, £70 billion cost under Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal
issues.environment: Address air pollution, promote ultra-low emission zones
issues.health: Support NHS, reverse cuts, ensure healthcare workers have needed resources

community.content: Promote ultra-low emission zones, invest in public transport
